questionTitle: I speak with an educated man. __________________
We must be careful when the teacher explains lessons. __________________
You met a little beggar child in the street. __________________
We sold our car and we will buy a new one. __________________
She is capable of making that work. __________________
I say that the math exam was very difficult. __________________
He was digging a deep hole to hide his fortune. __________________
You are eating delicious cakes made by your mother. __________________
